original_title: Great Land Battles Of The 20th Century
overview: The 20th century is destined to be remembered as an age of violence and strife. The turbulent passage of its years was to see many wars, but none was fought out over so wide of an arena as the mighty conflict known as the second World War. The great land battles of France and Stalingrad are chronicled, with rare footage of the conflict on the battlefield.
title: Great Land Battles Of The 20th Century
